p: Topical application of essential oils is often associated with other treatments, such as massage; therefore, it is difficult to separate their effect. Nevertheless, some clinical scientific evidence demonstrated that massage with essential oils was more effective than massage alone.[ 27] However, in our study, there was no effective massage due to the pain associated with the surgical scars and chamomile oil was gently applied on the skin. Some study demonstrated oral mineral oil can use in the treatment of constipation.[ 28] This study was showed its use on the abdominal cavity appears to improve bowel movements specially defecation. However, the effect of chamomile with mineral oil was more effective statistically.
